name: Worms 4: Mayhem
description:
Worms 4: Mayhem is a strategy game developed by Team17 Digital. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Codemasters. On review aggregator Metacritic, Worms 4: Mayhem has a score of 71. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Worms 4: Mayhem on PlayStation 2 and PC.
